{
 "cells": [
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "likely-radio",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "# NonFungible Python API Tutorial "
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "d22e8023",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "This tutorial aims to be a quick guide to get you started using the NonFungible API integrated into messari's python library."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 1,
   "id": "593e4795",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "from messari.nfts import NonFungible\n",
    "nf = NonFungible()"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 2,
   "id": "cc655cd8",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [],
   "source": [
    "collections = ['cryptopunks', 'doodles']\n",
    "import pandas as pd"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "813f1412",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## API Structure\n",
    "The NonFungible Python client contains a number of functions that wrap some of NonFungible's API endpoints. These include:\n",
    "\n",
    "Functions\n",
    "\n",
    "* get_collection_history\n",
    "* get_collection_stats\n",
    "* get_collection_summary\n",
    "\n",
    "Below are a few examples to showcase the functionality and types of data each function generates."
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "ecd6b9b7",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "## Functions"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "a40e89fa",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### get_collection_history"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "3b1e3b3d",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "get collection history, "
   ]
  },

   "source": [
    "collection_history_df = nf.get_collection_history(collections_in=collections, length=5)\n",
    "collection_history_df"
   ]
  },
  {

   "id": "d49761c3",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "can do '' to get all collections"
   ]
  },

  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "781aabfa",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "### get_collection_summary"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "markdown",
   "id": "16127a62",
   "metadata": {},
   "source": [
    "Retrieve quick collection summary"
   ]
  },
  {
   "cell_type": "code",
   "execution_count": 5,
   "id": "232408ba",
   "metadata": {},
   "outputs": [
    {
     "data": {
      "text/html": [
       "<div>\n",
       "<style scoped>\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th:only-of-type {\n",
       "        vertical-align: middle;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe tbody tr th {\n",
       "        vertical-align: top;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "\n",
       "    .dataframe thead th {\n",
       "        text-align: right;\n",
       "    }\n",
       "</style>\n",
       "<table border=\"1\" class=\"dataframe\">\n",
       "  <thead>\n",
       "    <tr style=\"text-align: right;\">\n",
       "      <th></th>\n",
       "      <th>cryptopunks</th>\n",
       "      <th>doodles</th>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </thead>\n",
       "  <tbody>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>name</th>\n",
       "      <td>cryptopunks</td>\n",
       "      <td>doodles</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>tickers</th>\n",
       "      <td>[{'project': 'cryptopunks'}]</td>\n",
       "      <td>[{'project': 'doodles'}]</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>categories</th>\n",
       "      <td>[Collectible]</td>\n",
       "      <td>[Collectible]</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>website</th>\n",
       "      <td>https://www.larvalabs.com/cryptopunks</td>\n",
       "      <td>https://doodles.app/</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>count</th>\n",
       "      <td>19953</td>\n",
       "      <td>26059</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>traders</th>\n",
       "      <td>5667</td>\n",
       "      <td>10823</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>usd</th>\n",
       "      <td>1884762762.14</td>\n",
       "      <td>187226510.81</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>average</th>\n",
       "      <td>94460.12</td>\n",
       "      <td>7184.72</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>currencies</th>\n",
       "      <td>[{'ticker': 'ETH', 'totalDecimalPrice': 651088...</td>\n",
       "      <td>[{'ticker': 'ETH', 'totalDecimalPrice': 46751....</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "    <tr>\n",
       "      <th>daily</th>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "      <td>None</td>\n",
       "    </tr>\n",
       "  </tbody>\n",
       "</table>\n",
       "</div>"
      ],
      "text/plain": [
       "                                                  cryptopunks  \\\n",
       "name                                              cryptopunks   \n",
       "tickers                          [{'project': 'cryptopunks'}]   \n",
       "categories                                      [Collectible]   \n",
       "website                 https://www.larvalabs.com/cryptopunks   \n",
